translated: 'Homage to the World-Honored One!

original: 發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
analyzed: 發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translated: We give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment.'

original: 』以此善根斷一切惡，而於其中尋得命終，轉生人中。
analyzed: 』以此善根斷一切惡，而於其中尋得命終，轉生人中。
translated: By this wholesome root, they ended all evil and soon attained rebirth among humans.

original: 熱惱眾生，以蒙光故，尋得清涼，離飢渴苦，受諸妙樂，乃至生於人中。
analyzed: 熱惱眾生，以蒙光故，尋得清涼，離飢渴苦，受諸妙樂，乃至生於人中。
translated: The tormented beings, having received the light, immediately became cool and free from the suffering of hunger and thirst, experiencing wonderful bliss, and were reborn among humans.

original: 如地獄、畜生、餓鬼，人亦如是。
analyzed: 如地獄、畜生、餓鬼，人亦如是。
translated: Just as in the hells, animal realms, and ghost realms, so it was among humans.

original: 其光遍照諸世界已，還遶佛身滿三匝已，從頂上入，是時即有無量無邊人、天、夜叉、阿修羅、乾闥婆、諸龍、羅剎，得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 其光遍照諸世界已，還遶佛身滿三匝已，從頂上入，是時即有無量無邊人、天、夜叉、阿修羅、乾闥婆、諸龍、羅剎，得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: The light illuminated all the worlds, then circled the Buddha's body three times and entered from the top of his head. At that time, countless humans, devas, yakshas, asuras, gandharvas, nagas, and rakshasas attained irreversibility from supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 復有不可計眾生，得陀羅尼三昧忍辱。
analyzed: 復有不可計眾生，得陀羅尼三昧忍辱。
translated: Furthermore, innumerable beings attained dharanis, samadhis, and patience.

original: 爾時，閻浮人間無量諸天，為佛世尊及比丘僧，自以天上種種所有，莊挍嚴飾安周城外閻浮之園，如天莊嚴等無差別，是人復作是念：
analyzed: 爾時，閻浮人間無量諸天，為佛世尊及比丘僧，自以天上種種所有，莊挍嚴飾安周城外閻浮之園，如天莊嚴等無差別，是人復作是念：
translated: At that time, countless devas in Jambudvipa, for the sake of the World-Honored Buddha and the bhikshu sangha, adorned and decorated the Jambudvipa Garden outside Anzhou City with various celestial things, no different from the celestial adornments. These people also thought:

original: 『我等今者當往觀之，并見如來及比丘僧，因聽受法。
analyzed: 『我等今者當往觀之，并見如來及比丘僧，因聽受法。
translated: We should go now to see it, and also see the Tathagata and the bhikshu sangha, and listen to and receive the Dharma.

analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，日日常有百千無量億那由他男子、女人、童男、童女，來至佛所，頭面禮佛及比丘僧，右遶三匝，恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎，并欲見此閻浮之園。
analyzed: 爾時，日日常有百千無量億那由他男子、女人、童男、童女，來至佛所，頭面禮佛及比丘僧，右遶三匝，恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎，并欲見此閻浮之園。
translated: At that time, every day, countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of nayutas of men, women, boys, and girls came to where the Buddha was, bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet and those of the bhikṣus, circumambulated him three times, and with respect, offerings, reverence, and praise, wished to see this Jambū Grove.

original: 其園門戶具足二萬，純七寶成，一一門前復敷五百七寶之床，有五百梵志各坐其上。
analyzed: 其園門戶具足二萬，純七寶成，一一門前復敷五百七寶之床，有五百梵志各坐其上。
translated: The gate of the grove was fully twenty thousand in number, made entirely of the seven treasures. In front of each gate, five hundred seven-treasure seats were arranged, with five hundred brāhmans each sitting upon them.

original: 若有眾生欲入是園，此諸梵志輙便勸化，令其畢定歸依三寶，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，然後乃聽入此園中，見於世尊及比丘僧，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎。
analyzed: 若有眾生欲入是園，此諸梵志輙便勸化，令其畢定歸依三寶，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，然後乃聽入此園中，見於世尊及比丘僧，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎。
translated: If there were sentient beings who wished to enter the grove, these brāhmans would immediately encourage them to take refuge in the Three Jewels with utmost sincerity and arouse the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment. Only then would they be allowed to enter the grove and see the World-Honored One and the assembly of bhikṣus, to pay homage, circumambulate, respectfully make offerings, revere, and praise them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，梵志於七歲中教化不可計天，令其畢定住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 爾時，梵志於七歲中教化不可計天，令其畢定住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: At that time, the brahman taught and transformed innumerable devas during the seven years, causing them to definitely abide in anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi.

original: 復令不可計龍、阿修羅、乾闥婆、羅剎、拘槃、茶毘、舍遮、餓鬼、畜生、地獄及人，畢定住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 復令不可計龍、阿修羅、乾闥婆、羅剎、拘槃、茶毘、舍遮、餓鬼、畜生、地獄及人，畢定住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: He also caused innumerable dragons, asuras, gandharvas, rākṣasas, kumbhāṇḍas, piśācas, hungry ghosts, animals, hell beings, and humans to definitely abide in anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，梵志過七歲已，以八萬四千金輪，惟除天輪，八萬四千白象七寶莊嚴，惟除象寶，乃至八萬四千種種諸樂，如是等物，欲以奉獻佛及眾僧。
analyzed: 爾時，梵志過七歲已，以八萬四千金輪，惟除天輪，八萬四千白象七寶莊嚴，惟除象寶，乃至八萬四千種種諸樂，如是等物，欲以奉獻佛及眾僧。
translated: At that time, after seven years had passed, the brahman had eighty-four thousand golden wheels, excluding the heavenly wheel, eighty-four thousand white elephants adorned with the seven treasures, excluding the elephant treasure, and up to eighty-four thousand kinds of music, with such things wishing to offer to the Buddha and the saṅgha.

original: 「爾時，轉輪聖王於七歲中，心無欲欲、無瞋恚欲、無愚癡欲、無憍慢欲、無國土欲、無兒息欲、無玉女欲、無食飲欲、無衣服欲、無華香欲、無車乘欲、無睡眠欲、無想樂欲、無有我欲、無有他欲，如是七歲，乃至無有一欲之心，常坐不臥，無晝夜想、無疲極想、亦復無聲、香、味、觸想。
analyzed: 「爾時，轉輪聖王於七歲中，心無欲欲、無瞋恚欲、無愚癡欲、無憍慢欲、無國土欲、無兒息欲、無玉女欲、無食飲欲、無衣服欲、無華香欲、無車乘欲、無睡眠欲、無想樂欲、無有我欲、無有他欲，如是七歲，乃至無有一欲之心，常坐不臥，無晝夜想、無疲極想、亦復無聲、香、味、觸想。
translated: At that time, the wheel-turning sage king, for seven years, had no desire for desire, no desire for anger, no desire for delusion, no desire for pride, no desire for country, no desire for children, no desire for beautiful women, no desire for food and drink, no desire for clothing, no desire for flowers and incense, no desire for vehicles, no desire for sleep, no desire for thoughts and pleasures, no desire for self, and no desire for others. For seven years, he had not a single desirous thought. He always sat without lying down, had no thought of day and night, no thought of fatigue, and also had no thought of sound, smell, taste, or touch.

original: 而於其中，常見十方一一方面如萬佛土，微塵數等諸佛世界清淨莊嚴，不見須彌及諸小山、大小鐵圍二山中間幽冥之處，日月星辰、諸天宮殿。
analyzed: 而於其中，常見十方一一方面如萬佛土，微塵數等諸佛世界清淨莊嚴，不見須彌及諸小山、大小鐵圍二山中間幽冥之處，日月星辰、諸天宮殿。
translated: In the meantime, he always saw in each of the ten directions, in buddha-realms as numerous as dust motes in ten thousand buddha-lands, the pure adornments, but did not see Mount Sumeru, the small mountains, the inner and outer iron mountain ranges, the dark places in between, the sun, moon, stars, and the celestial palaces.

original: 其所見者，惟見清淨莊嚴佛土。
analyzed: 其所見者，惟見清淨莊嚴佛土。
translated: What they see is only the pure and adorned Buddha lands.

original: 見是事已，隨願取之。
analyzed: 見是事已，隨願取之。
translated: Having seen this, they take them according to their wishes.

original: 如轉輪聖王於七歲中得受快樂，見於清淨種種莊嚴諸佛世界，願取上妙清淨佛土。
analyzed: 如轉輪聖王於七歲中得受快樂，見於清淨種種莊嚴諸佛世界，願取上妙清淨佛土。
translated: Like a wheel-turning sage king who, for seven years, experiences happiness, sees the pure and various adornments of the Buddha lands, and wishes to take the supreme and wonderful pure Buddha lands.

original: 轉輪聖王太子不眴，乃至千子八萬四千諸小王等，及九萬二千億眾生等，各七歲中心無欲欲，乃至無有香、味、觸想，各於靜處入定思惟，亦得見於十方世界一一方面如萬佛土，微塵數等諸佛世界所有莊嚴，不見須彌及諸小山、大小鐵圍、二山中間幽冥之處，日月星辰、諸天宮殿。
analyzed: 轉輪聖王太子不眴，乃至千子八萬四千諸小王等，及九萬二千億眾生等，各七歲中心無欲欲，乃至無有香、味、觸想，各於靜處入定思惟，亦得見於十方世界一一方面如萬佛土，微塵數等諸佛世界所有莊嚴，不見須彌及諸小山、大小鐵圍、二山中間幽冥之處，日月星辰、諸天宮殿。
translated: The prince of the wheel-turning sage king, Advitīya, and up to the thousand sons, the eighty-four thousand minor kings, and the ninety-two thousand koṭīs of sentient beings, each for seven years their minds are without desire, up to without the thought of fragrance, taste, and touch, each in a quiet place enters concentration and contemplation, and also sees in the ten directions, in each direction, as many Buddha lands as the dust particles in ten thousand Buddha lands, the adornments of the Buddha worlds, not seeing Mount Sumeru, the various small mountains, the inner and outer iron mountain ranges, the dark places in between, the sun, moon, stars, and the celestial palaces.

original: 其所見者，惟見清淨莊嚴佛土。
analyzed: 其所見者，惟見清淨莊嚴佛土。
translated: What they saw was only the pure and adorned buddha-land.

original: 如其所見，隨而取之。
analyzed: 如其所見，隨而取之。
translated: As they saw it, they took it as it was.

original: 如是一切諸大眾等，於七歲中各得修行種種法門，或願清淨佛土，或願不淨佛土。
analyzed: 如是一切諸大眾等，於七歲中各得修行種種法門，或願清淨佛土，或願不淨佛土。
translated: In this way, all the great assembly, during the seven years, each attained the practice of various Dharma gates, either wishing for a pure buddha-land or wishing for an impure buddha-land.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時梵志過七歲已，持諸七寶，奉獻於佛及比丘僧，向佛合掌前白佛言：
analyzed: 爾時梵志過七歲已，持諸七寶，奉獻於佛及比丘僧，向佛合掌前白佛言：
translated: At that time, after seven years, the brahman held the seven treasures and offered them to the Buddha and the bhikṣu saṅgha. He joined his palms before the Buddha and said:

original: 『世尊！🔽我已勸化轉輪聖王，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，還至住處靜坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
analyzed: 『世尊！ 我已勸化轉輪聖王，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，還至住處靜坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
translated: 'World-Honored One!🔽I have already inspired and transformed the wheel-turning sage king to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment. He returned to his dwelling place, sat in quiet meditation, and did not allow even one person to enter.

original: 我復勸化其王千子，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是諸王子亦各還至所住之處，靜坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
analyzed: 我復勸化其王千子，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是諸王子亦各還至所住之處，靜坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
translated: I have also inspired and transformed the king's thousand sons to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment. These princes also each returned to their dwelling places, sat in quiet meditation, and did not allow even one person to enter.

original: 八萬四千小王、九萬二千億眾生等，亦發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，各在靜處，端坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
analyzed: 八萬四千小王、九萬二千億眾生等，亦發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，各在靜處，端坐思惟，乃至不聽一人令入。
translated: 84,000 minor kings and 92,000 koṭīs of sentient beings also gave rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, each sitting upright in a quiet place, contemplating, not allowing even one person to enter.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 今當令是轉輪王等，從三昧起來至佛所，及我先所教化令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心者，悉令集此佛世尊所，一心端坐受於清淨佛之世界，不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，從佛授記已，當取國土及名姓字。
analyzed: 今當令是轉輪王等，從三昧起來至佛所，及我先所教化令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心者，悉令集此佛世尊所，一心端坐受於清淨佛之世界，不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，從佛授記已，當取國土及名姓字。
translated: Now I will cause this wheel-turning king and the others to arise from samādhi and come to where the Buddha is, as well as those whom I previously taught to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, all gathering at the site of the World-Honored Buddha, single-mindedly sitting upright, receiving the pure buddha-land, irreversibly turning away from supreme, perfect enlightenment, receiving the Buddha's prediction, and then taking the country and its name.

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，寶藏如來即入三昧王三昧，入是三昧已，於其口中出種種色光，青、黃、赤、白、紫，如轉輪王在定中者，各於其前有化梵王，作如是言：
analyzed: 爾時，寶藏如來即入三昧王三昧，入是三昧已，於其口中出種種色光，青、黃、赤、白、紫，如轉輪王在定中者，各於其前有化梵王，作如是言：
translated: At that time, the Tathāgata Ratnagarbha entered the samādhi-rāja samādhi. Having entered this samādhi, various colored lights emerged from his mouth, blue, yellow, red, white, and purple, like a wheel-turning king in concentration. Before each of them, there was a transformed Brahmā king who said like this:

original: 『汝等今者可從定起至於佛所，見佛世尊及比丘僧，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎。
analyzed: 『汝等今者可從定起至於佛所，見佛世尊及比丘僧，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎。
translated: You should now arise from concentration and go to where the Buddha is, to see the World-Honored Buddha and the assembly of bhikṣus, to pay homage, circumambulate, respect, make offerings, revere, and praise.

original: 汝等當知，寶海梵志於七歲中作法會竟，今佛世尊復當遊行諸餘國土。
analyzed: 汝等當知，寶海梵志於七歲中作法會竟，今佛世尊復當遊行諸餘國土。
translated: You should know that after the brāhman Sāgara has completed the Dharma assembly for seven years, the World-Honored Buddha will now travel to other countries.

original: 』時轉輪王等，聞是言已，尋從定起。
analyzed: 』時轉輪王等，聞是言已，尋從定起。
translated: At that time, the wheel-turning kings and others, having heard these words, arose from concentration.

original: 爾時，諸天在虛空中作諸伎樂，是時聖王即便嚴駕，與其千子、八萬四千諸小王等，九萬二千億人，前後導從出安周羅城向閻浮園，既到園外如法下車，步至佛所，頭面禮佛及比丘僧，却坐一面。
analyzed: 爾時，諸天在虛空中作諸伎樂，是時聖王即便嚴駕，與其千子、八萬四千諸小王等，九萬二千億人，前後導從出安周羅城向閻浮園，既到園外如法下車，步至佛所，頭面禮佛及比丘僧，却坐一面。
translated: At that time, the devas in the sky were playing various kinds of music. The sage king then immediately had his chariot prepared, and together with his thousand sons, the eighty-four thousand minor kings, and ninety-two billion people, he went out in a procession from the city of Anzhou to the Yanbu Garden. Having arrived outside the garden, he got down from his chariot in accordance with the rules and walked to where the Buddha was. He bowed his head at the Buddha's feet and at the feet of the bhikṣu saṅgha, and then sat to one side.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，梵志白聖王言：
analyzed: 爾時，梵志白聖王言：
translated: At that time, the brāhman said to the sage king:

original: 『惟願大王，持此寶物，并及大王先於三月，供養如來及比丘僧，種種珍寶八萬四千，安周羅城。
analyzed: 『惟願大王，持此寶物，并及大王先於三月，供養如來及比丘僧，種種珍寶八萬四千，安周羅城。
translated: 'May the great king take these precious things, and also the various precious treasures of eighty-four thousand, which the great king previously offered to the Tathāgata and the bhikṣu saṅgha for three months in the city of Anzhou.

original: 如是福德，今應迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 如是福德，今應迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: Such merit and virtue should now be dedicated to anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi.'

original: 』其王千子、八萬四千諸小王等，九萬二千億人，皆悉教令迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 』其王千子、八萬四千諸小王等，九萬二千億人，皆悉教令迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: The king's thousand sons, the eighty-four thousand minor kings, and the ninety-two thousand koṭis of people, all were taught to turn towards supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 復作是言：
analyzed: 復作是言：
translated: And they said:

original: 『大王當知，以此布施，不應求於忉利天王、大梵天王。
analyzed: 『大王當知，以此布施，不應求於忉利天王、大梵天王。
translated: 'Great King, you should know that with this giving, you should not seek to be the king of the Heaven of the Thirty-three or the king of the Great Brahma Heaven.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 王今福報所有珍寶，皆是無常、無決定相，猶如疾風，是故應當以此布施所得果報，令心自在，速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，度脫無量無邊眾生令入涅槃。
analyzed: 王今福報所有珍寶，皆是無常、無決定相，猶如疾風，是故應當以此布施所得果報，令心自在，速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，度脫無量無邊眾生令入涅槃。
translated: Because the precious treasures of the king's present blessings and rewards are all impermanent and uncertain, like a swift wind. Therefore, with the fruits of this giving, you should allow the mind to be free and quickly attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, delivering immeasurable and boundless sentient beings and causing them to enter nirvāṇa.'

original: 『如是等無量眾生，已不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，我今當與各各授記，并為示現種種佛土。

original: 以三昧力故，放大光明，遍照無量無邊世界，皆悉令是轉輪聖王，及無量眾生等，見無邊諸佛世界。
analyzed: 以三昧力故，放大光明，遍照無量無邊世界，皆悉令是轉輪聖王，及無量眾生等，見無邊諸佛世界。
translated: By the power of samādhi, he emitted great light, illuminating innumerable worlds, causing all the wheel-turning sage kings and innumerable sentient beings to see the boundless buddha lands.

original: 爾時，十方無量無邊諸餘世界，其中各各有大菩薩，蒙佛光故，以佛力故，各各悉來至於佛所，以己所得神足變化，供養於佛及比丘僧，頭面禮足，右遶三匝，坐於佛前，欲聽如來為諸菩薩受佛記莂。
analyzed: 爾時，十方無量無邊諸餘世界，其中各各有大菩薩，蒙佛光故，以佛力故，各各悉來至於佛所，以己所得神足變化，供養於佛及比丘僧，頭面禮足，右遶三匝，坐於佛前，欲聽如來為諸菩薩受佛記莂。
translated: At that time, in the innumerable worlds of the ten directions, the great bodhisattvas there, being illuminated by the Buddha's light and empowered by the Buddha, each came to the Buddha's place. Using their own spiritual powers and transformations, they made offerings to the Buddha and the assembly of bhikṣus. They bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet, circumambulated him three times to the right, and sat before the Buddha, wishing to hear the Tathāgata give predictions to the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: 我今真實欲得菩提，如我先於三月之中以諸所須，供養於佛及比丘僧，如是善根，我今迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，終不願取不淨佛土。
translated: I now truly wish to attain bodhi. As I have previously offered all necessities for three months to the Buddha and the assembly of bhikṣus, I now dedicate these roots of goodness to anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi. I will never wish to attain an impure buddha land.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我先已於七歲之中，端坐思惟種種莊嚴清淨佛土。
analyzed: 我先已於七歲之中，端坐思惟種種莊嚴清淨佛土。
translated: I have previously sat upright for seven years contemplating the various adornments of a pure buddha land.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我今發願：
analyzed: 我今發願：

original: 「令我得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，時世界之中無有地獄、畜生、餓鬼。
analyzed: 「令我得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，時世界之中無有地獄、畜生、餓鬼。
translated: May I attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, and at that time, within that world, there will be no hells, animals, or hungry ghosts.

original: 一切眾生命終之後，令不墮於三惡道中。
analyzed: 一切眾生命終之後，令不墮於三惡道中。
translated: After the lives of all sentient beings end, may they not fall into the three evil paths.

original: 世界眾生皆作金色，人天無別，皆得六通：
analyzed: 世界眾生皆作金色，人天無別，皆得六通：
translated: The sentient beings of that world will all have golden complexions, with no distinction between humans and gods, and they will all attain the six supernormal powers:

original: 以宿命通，乃至得知百千萬億那由他劫宿世之事；
analyzed: 以宿命通，乃至得知百千萬億那由他劫宿世之事；
translated: Through the supernormal power of knowing past lives, they will be able to know the events of their past lives for hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭīs of nayutas of kalpas;

original: 以清淨天眼，悉見百千億那由他十方世界，亦見其中在在處處現在諸佛說微妙法；
analyzed: 以清淨天眼，悉見百千億那由他十方世界，亦見其中在在處處現在諸佛說微妙法；
translated: Through the pure divine eye, they will see the Buddhas of the present teaching the subtle Dharma in the ten directions, in hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭīs of nayutas of worlds;

original: 以清淨天耳，悉聞百千億那由他十方世界現在諸佛說法之聲；
analyzed: 以清淨天耳，悉聞百千億那由他十方世界現在諸佛說法之聲；
translated: Through the pure divine ear, they will hear the sounds of the Dharma being taught by the Buddhas of the present in the ten directions, in hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭīs of nayutas of worlds;

original: 以他心智故，知無量無邊億那由他十方世界眾生之心；
analyzed: 以他心智故，知無量無邊億那由他十方世界眾生之心；
translated: Through the knowledge of others' minds, they will know the minds of sentient beings in the ten directions, in countless, limitless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭīs of nayutas of worlds;

original: 以如意通故，於一念中，遍於百千億那由他諸佛世界，周旋往返，令是眾生悉解無我及無我所，皆得不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 以如意通故，於一念中，遍於百千億那由他諸佛世界，周旋往返，令是眾生悉解無我及無我所，皆得不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: By means of the supernormal power of mental command, in a single thought, I will travel through hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of buddha-realms, and cause all sentient beings to understand non-self and the absence of anything that belongs to a self, and all attain irreversibility from supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 願我世界無有女人及其名字，一切眾生，等一化生，壽命無量，除其誓願。
analyzed: 願我世界無有女人及其名字，一切眾生，等一化生，壽命無量，除其誓願。
translated: I vow that in my world there will be no women or even the name of a woman, that all sentient beings will be born by transformation equally, with immeasurable lifespans, except for those who make vows.

original: 無有一切不善之名，世界清淨，無有臭穢，常有諸天微妙之香，皆悉充滿。
analyzed: 無有一切不善之名，世界清淨，無有臭穢，常有諸天微妙之香，皆悉充滿。
translated: There will be no mention of any unwholesomeness at all, the world will be pure, without any foul odors, always filled with the subtle fragrances of the gods.

original: 一切眾生皆悉成就三十二相，而各瓔珞。
analyzed: 一切眾生皆悉成就三十二相，而各瓔珞。
translated: All sentient beings will all attain the thirty-two marks, and each will be adorned with them.

original: 所有菩薩皆是一生，除其誓願。
analyzed: 所有菩薩皆是一生，除其誓願。
translated: All bodhisattvas will be in their last lifetime, except for those who make vows.

original: 願我世界所有眾生，於一食頃，以佛力故，遍至無量無邊世界，見現在佛，禮拜、圍遶，以其所得神足變化供養於佛，即於食頃還至本土而常講說佛之法藏，身得大力如那羅延。
analyzed: 願我世界所有眾生，於一食頃，以佛力故，遍至無量無邊世界，見現在佛，禮拜、圍遶，以其所得神足變化供養於佛，即於食頃還至本土而常講說佛之法藏，身得大力如那羅延。
translated: May the sentient beings in my world, in a single meal, by the power of the Buddha, go to immeasurable and boundless worlds, see the present Buddhas, pay homage and circumambulate them, make offerings to the Buddhas with their attained supernormal powers and transformations, and in a single meal return to their original lands, always expounding the Dharma treasury of the Buddhas, with bodies possessing great strength like Nārāyaṇa.

original: 世界所有莊嚴之事，乃至得天眼者不能盡說。
analyzed: 世界所有莊嚴之事，乃至得天眼者不能盡說。
translated: The adornments of the world, even those with the heavenly eye cannot fully describe them.

original: 所有眾生皆得四辯，一一菩薩所坐之樹，枝葉遍滿一萬由旬。
analyzed: 所有眾生皆得四辯，一一菩薩所坐之樹，枝葉遍滿一萬由旬。
translated: All sentient beings attain the four unobstructed [abilities], and for each Bodhisattva's seated tree, the branches and leaves fill a myriad of yojanas.

original: 世界常有淨妙光明，悉令他方無量佛土種種莊嚴而於中現。
analyzed: 世界常有淨妙光明，悉令他方無量佛土種種莊嚴而於中現。
translated: The world always has pure and wonderful light, causing the various adornments of immeasurable Buddha lands in other directions to appear within it.

original: 所有眾生乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不行不淨，常為其餘一切諸天、人及非人之所恭敬、供養、尊重，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 所有眾生乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不行不淨，常為其餘一切諸天、人及非人之所恭敬、供養、尊重，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: All sentient beings, up to attaining supreme perfect enlightenment, do not engage in impurity, and are always respected, revered, and honored by other celestial beings, humans, and non-humans, up to attaining supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 而於其中常得六根清淨，即於生時得無漏喜受於快樂，自然成就一切善根。
analyzed: 而於其中常得六根清淨，即於生時得無漏喜受於快樂，自然成就一切善根。
translated: And in the meantime, they always attain the purity of the six sense faculties, and upon birth, attain the undefiled joy and experience happiness, naturally accomplishing all wholesome roots.

original: 尋於生時著新袈裟便得三昧，其三昧名善分別，以三昧力，遍至無量諸佛世界，見現在佛，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，於此三昧無有退失。
analyzed: 尋於生時著新袈裟便得三昧，其三昧名善分別，以三昧力，遍至無量諸佛世界，見現在佛，禮拜、圍遶、恭敬、供養、尊重、讚歎，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，於此三昧無有退失。
translated: Upon birth, they put on new saffron robes and immediately attain samādhi, that samādhi is called well-discriminating, by the power of samādhi, they go to immeasurable buddha-realms everywhere, see the present buddhas, pay homage, circumambulate, respect, make offerings, revere, and praise them, up to attaining supreme perfect enlightenment, without losing this samādhi.

original: 所有菩薩如其所願，各自莊嚴修淨妙土，於七寶樹中悉皆遙見諸佛世界一切眾生，尋於生時得遍至三昧，以三昧力故，常見十方無量無邊諸世界中現在諸佛，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提終不退失。
analyzed: 所有菩薩如其所願，各自莊嚴修淨妙土，於七寶樹中悉皆遙見諸佛世界一切眾生，尋於生時得遍至三昧，以三昧力故，常見十方無量無邊諸世界中現在諸佛，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提終不退失。
translated: All bodhisattvas, according to their wishes, each adorn and cultivate a pure and wondrous land. Within the seven-jeweled trees, they all see the worlds and all beings of the buddhas from afar. Upon their birth, they attain the samādhi of universal access. By the power of this samādhi, they always see the innumerable and boundless buddhas of the present in the worlds of the ten directions, until they attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, never regressing or losing it.

original: 願令我界所有眾生，皆得宮殿、衣服、瓔珞，種種莊嚴，猶如第六化自在天。
analyzed: 願令我界所有眾生，皆得宮殿、衣服、瓔珞，種種莊嚴，猶如第六化自在天。
translated: May I cause all beings in my realm to attain palaces, garments, and jeweled necklaces, various adornments, just like the sixth heaven of the desire realm.

original: 世界無有山陵、垖阜、大小鐵圍、須彌、大海，亦無陰蓋，及諸障閡、煩惱之聲，無三惡道八難之名、無有受苦之名，及不苦不樂名。
analyzed: 世界無有山陵、垖阜、大小鐵圍、須彌、大海，亦無陰蓋，及諸障閡、煩惱之聲，無三惡道八難之名、無有受苦之名，及不苦不樂名。
translated: The world will have no mountains, hills, mounds, large or small iron enclosures, Mount Sumeru, or great oceans. There will also be no obscurations, obstructions, or afflictive sounds. There will be no names of the three evil destinies or the eight difficulties, no names of suffering or of neither suffering nor happiness.

original: 」世尊！
analyzed: 」世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我今所願如是。
analyzed: 我今所願如是。
translated: My present vow is like this.

original: 欲得如是嚴淨佛土。
analyzed: 欲得如是嚴淨佛土。
translated: I wish to attain such a pure and adorned buddha land.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我於來世便當久久行菩薩道，要得成就如是清淨佛土。
analyzed: 我於來世便當久久行菩薩道，要得成就如是清淨佛土。
translated: In the future, I will practice the bodhisattva path for a long time, and I must attain such a pure buddha land.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我於來世作是希有事已，然後乃成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 我於來世作是希有事已，然後乃成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: After I have accomplished these rare events in the future, I will then attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，菩提樹縱廣正等一萬由旬。
analyzed: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，菩提樹縱廣正等一萬由旬。
translated: When I attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, the bodhi tree will be ten thousand yojanas in length and width.

original: 於此樹下坐道場時，於一念中成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 於此樹下坐道場時，於一念中成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: While sitting at the site of enlightenment under this tree, in a single thought I will attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，光明照於無量無邊百千億那由他諸佛世界。
analyzed: 成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，光明照於無量無邊百千億那由他諸佛世界。
translated: After attaining supreme, perfect enlightenment, my light will illuminate countless, limitless hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of buddha worlds.

original: 令我壽命無量無邊百千億那由他劫，無能知者，除一切智。
analyzed: 令我壽命無量無邊百千億那由他劫，無能知者，除一切智。
translated: May my lifespan be immeasurable, limitless hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of kalpas, unknowable to all except the Omniscient One.

original: 令我世界無有聲聞、辟支佛乘，所有大眾純諸菩薩，無量無邊無能數者，除一切智。
analyzed: 令我世界無有聲聞、辟支佛乘，所有大眾純諸菩薩，無量無邊無能數者，除一切智。
translated: May my world be devoid of the vehicles of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and may the great assembly consist solely of bodhisattvas, immeasurable and boundless, beyond count, except for the Omniscient One.

original: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，令十方諸佛稱揚讚歎我之名字。
analyzed: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，令十方諸佛稱揚讚歎我之名字。
translated: May I, upon attaining supreme perfect enlightenment, have my name extolled and praised by the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，無量無邊阿僧祇餘佛世界，所有眾生聞我名者，修諸善本，欲生我界，願其捨命之後必定得生，惟除五逆、誹謗聖人、廢壞正法。
analyzed: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，無量無邊阿僧祇餘佛世界，所有眾生聞我名者，修諸善本，欲生我界，願其捨命之後必定得生，惟除五逆、誹謗聖人、廢壞正法。
translated: May I, upon attaining supreme perfect enlightenment, have the sentient beings in immeasurable, boundless, incalculable other buddha-worlds, upon hearing my name and cultivating various wholesome roots, wish to be born in my realm, and after their lives end, definitely attain birth, except for those who have committed the five heinous crimes, slandered the true Dharma, or destroyed the true teaching.

original: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，其餘無量無邊阿僧祇諸佛世界所有眾生，若發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，修諸菩提，欲生我界者，臨終之時，我時當與大眾圍遶現其人前，其人見我，即於我所，得心歡喜，以見我故，離諸障閡，即便捨身，來生我界。
analyzed: 願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，其餘無量無邊阿僧祇諸佛世界所有眾生，若發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，修諸菩提，欲生我界者，臨終之時，我時當與大眾圍遶現其人前，其人見我，即於我所，得心歡喜，以見我故，離諸障閡，即便捨身，來生我界。
translated: May I, having attained supreme perfect enlightenment, cause the sentient beings in the innumerable, limitless, and incalculable other Buddha-lands, who have given rise to supreme perfect enlightenment and cultivated bodhi, and wish to be born in my realm, to see me surrounded by the great assembly at the time of their death. translated: I do not wish for an impure and evil world. May my country and bodhi tree be like the various adornments of the world and the jeweled bodhi tree of Avalokiteśvara, and may I attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 復願遍出功德光明佛始初成道，我當先請轉於法輪，隨其說法所經時節，於其中間行菩薩道。

translated: The merit and virtue of my offerings to the Tathagata and the assembly of monks for three months, as well as the pure actions of my body, speech, and mind, I now dedicate all of this towards supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 我今所願，不能於是不淨世界成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，亦復不願速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 我今所願，不能於是不淨世界成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，亦復不願速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: My present vow is not to attain supreme, perfect enlightenment in this impure world, nor do I wish to quickly attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 我行菩薩道時，願令我所化十方無量無邊諸佛世界所有眾生，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，安止於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，勸化安止於六波羅蜜者，願令先我悉於十方一一方面，如恒河沙佛剎微塵數等諸佛世界成佛說法，令我爾時以清淨天眼悉遍見之。
analyzed: 我行菩薩道時，願令我所化十方無量無邊諸佛世界所有眾生，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，安止於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，勸化安止於六波羅蜜者，願令先我悉於十方一一方面，如恒河沙佛剎微塵數等諸佛世界成佛說法，令我爾時以清淨天眼悉遍見之。
translated: When I practice the bodhisattva path, may I cause the sentient beings in the immeasurable and boundless buddha-realms in the ten directions that I transform, to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, to be at peace in the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and to be inspired and settled in the six perfections. May I first attain buddhahood in each of the ten directions, in buddha-realms as numerous as the dust particles in the buddha-lands of the Ganges River, and expound the Dharma. May I at that time see them all with my pure divine eye.

original: 願我為菩薩時，能作如是無量佛事，我於來世行菩薩道無有齊限，我所教化諸眾生等，令其心淨猶如梵天，如是眾生生我界者，爾乃當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，以是等清淨莊嚴佛剎。
analyzed: 願我為菩薩時，能作如是無量佛事，我於來世行菩薩道無有齊限，我所教化諸眾生等，令其心淨猶如梵天，如是眾生生我界者，爾乃當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，以是等清淨莊嚴佛剎。
translated: May I, as a bodhisattva, be able to perform such immeasurable buddha-works. In my future practice of the bodhisattva path, there will be no limit. The sentient beings that I teach and transform will have pure minds like Brahma Heaven. Such sentient beings who are born in my realm will then attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, and with them, purify and adorn the buddha-land.

original: 願令三千大千世界恒河沙等十方佛土，為一佛剎，周匝世界有大寶牆七寶填廁，其牆高大至無色界，真紺琉璃以為其地，無諸塵土石沙穢惡荊蕀之屬，又無惡觸，亦無女人及其名字，一切眾生皆悉化生，不食揣食等，以法喜三昧為食，無有聲聞、辟支佛乘，純諸菩薩，離於貪欲瞋恚愚癡，皆修梵行、悉滿其國。
analyzed: 願令三千大千世界恒河沙等十方佛土，為一佛剎，周匝世界有大寶牆七寶填廁，其牆高大至無色界，真紺琉璃以為其地，無諸塵土石沙穢惡荊蕀之屬，又無惡觸，亦無女人及其名字，一切眾生皆悉化生，不食揣食等，以法喜三昧為食，無有聲聞、辟支佛乘，純諸菩薩，離於貪欲瞋恚愚癡，皆修梵行、悉滿其國。
translated: May the worlds of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges, in the trichiliocosm, become a single buddha land, surrounded by great jeweled walls filled with the seven treasures. The walls are lofty and vast, reaching up to the formless realm. The ground is made of genuine dark blue lapis lazuli, free from dust, earth, stones, sand, impurities, thorns and the like. There are no unpleasant tactile sensations, nor are there women or even their names. All beings are born through transformation, do not eat solid food, and subsist on the joy of the Dharma and samadhi. There are no shravakas or pratyekabuddhas, only bodhisattvas, free from greed, hatred, and delusion. They all practice pure conduct and fill the land.

original: 當其生已，鬚髮自落，服三法衣，即於生已，便欲得食，尋有寶器，在右手中，自然而有上妙百味具足在鉢。🔽時諸菩薩作是思惟：
analyzed: 當其生已，鬚髮自落，服三法衣，即於生已，便欲得食，尋有寶器，在右手中，自然而有上妙百味具足在鉢。🔽時諸菩薩作是思惟：
translated: As soon as they are born, their beards and hair fall out, and they don the three Dharma robes. As soon as they are born, they wish to eat, and then a jeweled vessel appears in their right hand, naturally filled with the finest hundred flavors.

original: 「我等不應噉是揣食，我今當持至於十方，供養諸佛及聲聞眾，并貧窮者；
analyzed: 「我等不應噉是揣食，我今當持至於十方，供養諸佛及聲聞眾，并貧窮者；
translated: We should not eat this solid food. We should now take it to the ten directions to make offerings to the buddhas, the assembly of śrāvakas, and the poor;

original: 有諸餓鬼，受饑渴苦其身熾然，當至其所，而給足之；
analyzed: 有諸餓鬼，受饑渴苦其身熾然，當至其所，而給足之；
translated: There are hungry ghosts who suffer from hunger and thirst, their bodies burning. We should go to them and satisfy them;

original: 我等自應修行法喜三昧之食。
analyzed: 我等自應修行法喜三昧之食。
translated: We ourselves should practice the food of the samādhi of Dharma joy.

original: 」作是念已，得菩薩三昧，其三昧名不可思議行。
analyzed: 」作是念已，得菩薩三昧，其三昧名不可思議行。
translated: Having had this thought, they attained the bodhisattva samādhi, whose name was the inconceivable practice.

original: 得是三昧已，即得無閡神力，到於無量無邊世界現在佛所，供養諸佛及比丘僧，給施貧窮，下至餓鬼，作是施已，因為說法，尋於食時，周旋往返，還歸本土；
analyzed: 得是三昧已，即得無閡神力，到於無量無邊世界現在佛所，供養諸佛及比丘僧，給施貧窮，下至餓鬼，作是施已，因為說法，尋於食時，周旋往返，還歸本土；
translated: Having attained this samādhi, they immediately attained unobstructed spiritual powers, and went to the buddhas who were presently in the innumerable and boundless worlds to make offerings to the buddhas and the assembly of bhikṣus, give to the poor, and even to the hungry ghosts. After making these offerings, they expounded the Dharma for them. In the time it took to eat a meal, they went back and forth and returned to their own lands;

original: 衣服珍寶及所須物，供養諸佛，下至餓鬼，亦復如是，然後自用。
analyzed: 衣服珍寶及所須物，供養諸佛，下至餓鬼，亦復如是，然後自用。
translated: The clothing, precious treasures, and necessary items for making offerings to the buddhas, down to the hungry ghosts, were also like this, and then they used them themselves.

original: 願令我世界無有八難不善苦惱，亦無受戒、毀戒、懺悔及其名字。
analyzed: 願令我世界無有八難不善苦惱，亦無受戒、毀戒、懺悔及其名字。
translated: May my world be free from the eight difficulties, unwholesomeness, suffering and distress, and also free from the names of receiving precepts, violating precepts, and repentance.

original: 願我世界，常有無量種種珍寶以為廁填，珍寶衣樹十方世界，所未曾有，未曾見聞，乃至億歲說其名字猶不能盡。
analyzed: 願我世界，常有無量種種珍寶以為廁填，珍寶衣樹十方世界，所未曾有，未曾見聞，乃至億歲說其名字猶不能盡。
translated: May my world always be filled with countless precious treasures, and may the precious treasure trees be unheard of and unseen in the worlds of the ten directions, and even if their names are spoken for millions of years, it still cannot be fully described.

original: 願我世界諸菩薩等，欲見金色隨意得見，欲見銀色亦隨意見，當見銀時不失金相，當見金時不失銀相，頗梨、琉璃、車𤦲、馬瑙及赤真珠，種種珍寶隨意得見，亦復如是；
analyzed: 願我世界諸菩薩等，欲見金色隨意得見，欲見銀色亦隨意見，當見銀時不失金相，當見金時不失銀相，頗梨、琉璃、車𤦲、馬瑙及赤真珠，種種珍寶隨意得見，亦復如是；
translated: May the bodhisattvas in my world, if they wish to see golden color, be able to see it as they wish. If they wish to see silver color, they will also see it as they wish. When seeing silver, they will not lose the appearance of gold. When seeing gold, they will not lose the appearance of silver. For various precious treasures such as crystal, lapis lazuli, agate, carnelian, and red pearls, if they wish to see them, it will be the same.

original: 欲見阿竭琉香、多伽琉香、多摩羅跋栴檀沈水、及赤栴檀、牛頭栴檀，欲見純栴檀者，隨意得見，欲見沈水者，亦隨意見，當見沈水不失栴檀，當見栴檀不失沈水，餘亦如是，種種所願皆得成就。
analyzed: 欲見阿竭琉香、多伽琉香、多摩羅跋栴檀沈水、及赤栴檀、牛頭栴檀，欲見純栴檀者，隨意得見，欲見沈水者，亦隨意見，當見沈水不失栴檀，當見栴檀不失沈水，餘亦如是，種種所願皆得成就。
translated: If one wishes to see agaru incense, tagara incense, tamalapatra sandalwood, aloeswood, red sandalwood, ox-head sandalwood, or pure sandalwood, one can see it as one wishes. If one wishes to see aloeswood, one can also see it as one wishes. When seeing aloeswood, one does not lose sandalwood. When seeing sandalwood, one does not lose aloeswood. The same is true for the rest. All kinds of wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 願我世界無有日月，諸菩薩等有大光明，如本所求自然而出，乃至能照百千萬億那由他世界，以光明故無有晝夜，眾華開敷即知晝分，眾華合時便知夜分，世界調適無有寒熱及老病死。
analyzed: 願我世界無有日月，諸菩薩等有大光明，如本所求自然而出，乃至能照百千萬億那由他世界，以光明故無有晝夜，眾華開敷即知晝分，眾華合時便知夜分，世界調適無有寒熱及老病死。
translated: I wish that in my world there will be no sun and moon. The bodhisattvas will have great light, naturally arising as originally sought, able to illuminate hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭīs of nayutas of worlds. Because of the light, there will be no day or night. When the flowers bloom, it will be known as daytime. When the flowers close, it will be known as nighttime.
